thread.title: Boston Restaurants With the Most Stunning Design
thread.title_full: Boston Restaurants With the Most Stunning Design

author: Rachel Leah Blumenthal
title: Boston Restaurants With the Most Stunning Design
text:
Boston Restaurants With the Most Stunning Design Take a look back through four years of Stone Cold Stunner nominees and winners share 
Every November, Eater announces the winners of the annual Eater Awards â€” chefs, bartenders, and restaurants that played key roles in the city's dining scene that year. One category, Stone Cold Stunner, celebrates excellent restaurant design. Here's a look back at the nominees and winner from each of the past four years. 
2016 Feast Your Eyes Upon Tiger Mama, Your New Tropical Vacation Destination in Fenway Tiger Mama. Photos by Katie Chudy for Eater. Tapestry Look Inside Parsnip, Opening in Harvard Square Tomorrow Parsnip. Photos by Rachel Leah Blumenthal for Eater. Stoked Pizza Stoked Debuts in Brookline Tomorrow With Wood-Fired Pizza and Pizza Pac-Man Bathrooms Stoked Wood Fired Pizza Co. Photos by Katie Chudy for Eater. Waypoint Waypoint in Cambridge. Photos by Rachel Leah Blumenthal for Eater. 
2015 Yvonne's. Photos provided by Yvonne's, courtesy of Eric Levin . Banyan Bar + Refuge Relax Under Tree Branches at Banyan Bar + Refuge, Open Now Banyan Bar + Refuge. Photos by Katie Chudy for Eater. Committee Opening Alert: Committee Brings Small Mediterranean Plates to the Seaport Today Committee. Photos by Chris Coe for Eater. Coppersmith Settle Onto a Patio and Eat From Indoor Food Trucks This Friday at Coppersmith Coppersmith. Photos by Katie Chudy for Eater. Hojoko Hojoko, Your New Favorite Izakaya, Debuts in Fenway Tonight Hojoko. Photos by Rachel Leah Blumenthal for Eater. 
2014
